bug.author: fbordignon
bug.description:
ksizes should be sizes on:
tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py
Line 4806 in e5bf8de
ksizes=[1, 3, 3, 1],
also on lines 4805 and 4835 the call needs updating to tf.image.extract_patches
tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py
Line 4805 in e5bf8de
tf.extract_image_patches(images=images,
tensorflow/tensorflow/python/ops/array_ops.py
Line 4835 in e5bf8de
tf.extract_image_patches(images=images,

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/fbordignon>@fbordignon</denchmark-link> Added a PR <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/38819>#38819</denchmark-link> for the fix. Thanks for pointing out!
